text: Wayne Brent Meredith (born October 4, 1939) is an American former ice hockey defenseman and Olympian. Meredith played with Team USA at the 1964 Winter Olympics held in Innsbruck, Austria.https://www.hockey- reference.com/olympics/athletes/wayne-meredith-1 He played for the University of Minnesota and for the St. Paul Saints of the International Hockey League. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1939 births Category:Living people Category:Ice hockey players from Indiana Category:Ice hockey players at the 1964 Winter Olympics Category:Olympic ice hockey players of the United States Category:Sportspeople from South Bend, Indiana Category:American men's ice hockey defensemen Category:Minnesota Golden Gophers men's ice hockey players
title: Wayne Meredith
